'''Kaedehara Kageharu''' was [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]'s father who died prior the start of the game. Kazuha's memories with him appear during the ''[[Summertime Odyssey]]'' event, Act II: ''[[As the Courtyard in Spring Once Appeared (Part 1)|As the Courtyard in Spring Once Appeared]]''.
